short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator for links, URLs, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily generate QR codes from URLs with our simple and intuitive QR Code Generator extension. Whether you need a QR code for a website, a document, or any other URL, this tool has you covered. Customize the size, format, and color of your QR codes to suit your needs.

Features
Generate QR Codes from URLs: Automatically use the current tab's URL or enter a custom URL to generate a QR code.

Customizable Size: Choose from multiple size options (512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048) to get the perfect QR code for your needs.

Multiple Formats: Generate QR codes in PNG or SVG format.

Color Customization: Select the color of the QR code to match your branding or personal preference.

Downloadable QR Codes: Easily download the generated QR code for use in your projects.

How to Use
1. Enter URL: Input the URL you want to generate a QR code for, or use the current tab's URL.
2. Select Size: Choose the desired size for your QR code.
3. Select Format: Pick the format (PNG or SVG) for your QR code.
4. Choose Color: Customize the color of your QR code.
5. Generate: Click the "Generate QR Code" button to create your QR code.
6. Download: Click the download link to save your QR code.

Why Use Our QR Code Generator?
1. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and easy-to-use interface for quick QR code generation.
2. Customization Options: Tailor your QR codes to fit your specific needs with various size, format, and color options.
3. Convenience: Generate and download QR codes directly from your browser without any hassle.

Get Started
Install the QR Code Generator extension today and start creating customized QR codes in seconds!
